Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pip~rodromoc m~baptict/c: Iwann/c piref]wmc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O forerunner and baptizer, John the Baptist, that He may forgive us our sins.
